cards.name: Geist of Saint Traft
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

cards.name: Bonds of Faith
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

cards.name: Cathedral Sanctifier
cards.text: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Champion of the Parish
cards.text: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Parish.

cards.name: Chapel Geist
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Dearly Departed
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Dearly Departed is in your graveyard, each Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Doomed Traveler
cards.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Eerie Interlude
cards.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Elder Cathar
cards.text: When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

cards.name: Emancipation Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Fiend Hunter
cards.text:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Gather the Townsfolk
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

cards.name: Goldnight Redeemer
cards.text:
Flying
When Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.

cards.name: Increasing Devotion
cards.text:
Put five 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield. If Increasing Devotion was cast from a graveyard, put ten of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
Flashback {7}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Momentary Blink
cards.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Moorland Inquisitor
cards.text: {2}{W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Rebuke
cards.text: Destroy target attacking creature.

cards.name: Slayer of the Wicked
cards.text: When Slayer of the Wicked enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Vampire, Werewolf, or Zombie.

cards.name: Spectral Gateguards
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Spectral Gateguards is paired with another creature, both creatures have vigilance.

cards.name: Thraben Heretic
cards.text: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard.

cards.name: Topplegeist
cards.text:
Flying
When Topplegeist enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, tap target creature that player controls.

cards.name: Village Bell-Ringer
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Village Bell-Ringer enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.

cards.name: Voice of the Provinces
cards.text:
Flying
When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Captain of the Mists
cards.text:
Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap Captain of the Mists.
{1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.

cards.name: Gryff Vanguard
cards.text:
Flying
When Gryff Vanguard enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Mist Raven
cards.text:
Flying
When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Nephalia Smuggler
cards.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Pore Over the Pages
cards.text: Draw three cards, untap up to two lands, then discard a card.

cards.name: Tandem Lookout
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

cards.name: Tower Geist
cards.text:
Flying
When Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Butcher's Cleaver
Sharpened Pitchfork
Seraph Sanctuary
cards.text:
When Seraph Sanctuary enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Tranquil Cove
cards.text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Mindwrack Demon
cards.text:
Flying, trample
When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Compelling Deterrence
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card if you control a Zombie.

cards.name: Forbidden Alchemy
cards.text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Havengul Runebinder
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

cards.name: Makeshift Mauler
cards.text: As an additional cost to cast Makeshift Mauler, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

cards.name: Relentless Skaabs
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Relentless Skaabs, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Scrapskin Drake
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.

cards.name: Screeching Skaab
cards.text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

cards.name: Stitched Drake
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Stitched Drake, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Flying

cards.name: Abattoir Ghoul
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Abattoir Ghoul this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Appetite for Brains
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 4 or greater and exile that card.

cards.name: Barter in Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

cards.name: Butcher Ghoul
cards.text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Diregraf Ghoul
cards.text: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Dread Return
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Driver of the Dead
cards.text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Falkenrath Noble
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Ghoulraiser
cards.text: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Gravecrawler
cards.text:
Gravecrawler can't block.
You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.

cards.name: Harvester of Souls
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Human Frailty
cards.text: Destroy target Human creature.

cards.name: Moan of the Unhallowed
cards.text:
Put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Sever the Bloodline
cards.text:
Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Tooth Collector
cards.text:
When Tooth Collector enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, target creature that player controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Tribute to Hunger
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Unbreathing Horde
cards.text:
Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard.
If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

cards.name: Victim of Night
cards.text: Destroy target non-Vampire, non-Werewolf, non-Zombie creature.

cards.name: Diregraf Captain
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: Cobbled Wings
cards.text:
Equipped creature has flying.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Dismal Backwater
cards.text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
